Half-Life is a legendary, must-to-play 1998 FPS game developed by Valve. To consider yourself a true gamer, you must have this game under your belt. A game strongly recommended for everyone and an excellent game for people that are starting to become gamers. Give this to your kids as their 1st game, you won't regret it and they will be thankful in the future. 

Playing a badass dude and a legendary gaming character named Gordon Freeman, Ph.D. in Theoretical Physics, which I guess Ph.D. gives you knowledge of every weapon you touch and just kick ass. Works for the Black Mesa and gets involved in an experiment that goes wrong and opens a dimension to another world called Xen. Through each fight and puzzle, you piece together the story in the game. Also, in the game, you will meet another legendary but mysterious character, G-Man. He plays a huge role in this game and the Half-Life sequels. Won't spoil them and the story. You should experience it all with a huge jaw drop and dilated pupils.

The game consists of 1 Training room and 3 modes, easy, medium, and hard.
The training room is strongly recommended for new gamers and for gamers that haven't played a Valve game in their life. Get to know how the game functions and its controls. If you skip it and act all tough, you will have big difficulties.
Now the modes:
1. Easy mode: Recommended for new gamers. Not difficult at all and not even a challenger. Great way to observe the game, it's surrounding and the story behind it without any fear of getting killed instantly. Difficulty 1/10;
2. Medium mode: Great for players that never played a Valve game before but aren't new to FPS games. It's the same as the easy mode, just with the challenging fights. Difficulty 5/10;
3. Hard mode: This mode is for veterans and people that enjoy pain. It's challenging as hell and keeps the adrenalin pumping. Difficulty 10/10;

Of the various weapons that are offered in this game, I must praise the most powerful weapon in this game. Equivalent to the Doom 1993 shotgun (not as powerful and impactful as the Doom 1993 shotgun), the 44. Magnum. Its amazing power strikes down all foes, no matter their sizes and the difficulty you will play on. If you ever feel endangered just whip out this bad boy and it will do the job. The best weapon in this game!

Personally, the worst weapon in this game is the HECU RPG, the bazooka in the game. Proved unworthy and cost my life many times. It has a guiding option to guide your missiles, and boy did they miss, a lot. It seems like it was a hit, but it goes through them. In hard mode, it barely does a thing. I prefer using the crowbar and the pistol over this thing. Almost always I barely use this thing, because the rest of the arsenal does a better job.

Multiplayer: After so many years, it's still alive and you can easily find a couple of good and full servers. The multiplayer is awesome and you need to check it out. You must experience it.
This game is cooler than Half-Life 2

This game has not aged well. There is an argument that this game is "good" because it has historical significance, but would you rather drive a Ford Model T or a Tesla Model S? Go play Black Mesa instead.

Esperamos con las cr√≠ticas negativas ‚Äì divertidas de escribir y leer- pero la triste verdad que debemos afrontar, es que en el gran orden de las cosas, cualquier basura tiene m√°s significado que lo que deja ver nuestra cr√≠tica. Pero en ocasiones el cr√≠tico si se arriesga cada vez que descubre y defiende algo nuevo‚Ä¶ el mundo suele ser cruel con el nuevo talento, las nuevas creaciones‚Ä¶ lo nuevo, necesita amigos. Anoche experiment√© algo nuevo, una extraordinaria cena de una fuente singular e inesperada, decir s√≥lo que la comida y su creador han desafiado mis prejuicios sobre la buena cocina subestimar√≠a la realidad. Es dif√≠cil imaginar un origen m√°s humilde que el del genio que ahora cocina en el restaurante Gusteau, y quien, en opini√≥n de este cr√≠tico, es nada menos que el mejor chef de Francia.
